<reflect>He wants to start the conversation. I'll keep it brief.</reflect>Hello, I'm Maria. And you are Sam, right?
Hello Maria! Actually, I'm Alex. It's a pleasure to meet you. How has your day been so far?

<reflect>He's being friendly. I'll respond briefly.</reflect>It's been fine, thanks. Just got back from work. Been feeling a bit stressed lately, to be honest. The traffic in Quezon City is getting worse every day.

I can only imagine! Traffic really can add an unexpected layer of stress to any day. It's great that you could take some time to sit down and have coffee. Hopefully, this can be a little breather for you. What do you usually do to unwind after a stressful day?

<reflect>He's trying to build rapport. I'll keep it short.</reflect>I actually enjoy playing piano in my free time. It helps me relax. I also love going for hikes with friends on weekends. Nature always clears my mind.
That sounds wonderful. Music and nature can be such great escapes. Hiking is a great way to reconnect and refresh. Do you have a favorite hiking spot around Quezon City?<|eot_id|>
